name: ONE VERY BAD DAY
description:
_______________________________________________ (Originally made as a school project)
 _______________________________________________ - "STORY" -

(Eh, big words)

In One Very Bad Day, you play as a generic office employee who's given a challenge; stand in the middle of a crowded city and dodge as many cars as you can, the riskier the dodge, the better! Don't bore him though, else you'll fail..

_______________________________________________ - GAMEPLAY -

Don't get ran over by the cars coming your way !
They will come faster and faster the longer you play

If you dodge a car from close up rather than far away, you will get 5 PTS instead of 1 PT.

_______________________________________________ - UPGRADES -

Using the PTS you've accumulated through playing, you can unlock upgrades to help you achieve higher scores !

Including :

Faster run , visualize close dodge distances, your friend gets bored slower.

_______________________________________________ - CONTROLS -

- Use Q/D on your Keyboard to move left and right (left stick on controller).- Hold your mouse's left button to run (hold left bumper on controller).

_______________________________________________
